page.title: 04A DAY AT SCHOOL IN CHALFORD
page.content: At 6.55 a.m.this morning I woke up and got dressed.Then I went down stairs and took the dog for a walk.Afterwards I had my breakfast.Then I went outside to play until 8.15 a.m.After that I set off for school.The school which I go to is Christ Church School. When I got to school I played football with my friends.At nine o'clock we went in for Assembly where we sang a song and said prayers.After that we did maths until break.Then we came in and did English.After lunch we read stories.Then we played rounders.At five past three we went home.I played with my dogs after doing my homework. Then I watched television before I went to bed.
